profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Tuesday April 23, 2019 at 00:00

did.abstract: Choral works by alumni and faculty of the Yale School of Music

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to researchers by appointment. There are no restricted materials in the collection. Please contact the Special Collections staff to schedule an appointment.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The collection was established in the Music Library of Yale University by Luther Noss in 1974.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The collection is the physical property of the Irving S. Gilmore Music Library of Yale University. Copyrights belong to the composers and authors, or their legal heirs and assigns.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Misc. Ms. 57, Choral Octavos by Yale Alumni in the Irving S. Gilmore Music Library of Yale University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of 178 choral works, nearly all of them composed by alumni of the Yale School of Music; the faculty of the School is also represented. The collection was assembled by Luther Noss and consists primarily of published octavos; some reproductions of manuscript scores are also included.
